channel.title: Xteleall command
channel.description: Whats the command for Xteleall... not the command ingame but the code to add it?

item.title: Xteleall command
item.dc:creator: @aplwanabes aplwanabes
item.description:
@aplwanabes wrote:

it doesnt give any errors but it just doesnt work and i put it with all my other commands

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleall command
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

aplwanabes:

it still doesnt work though lmao

Put it under your customCommand() method if you haven’t already.

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleall command
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:5, topic:321269”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=417719.msg3070799#msg3070799 date=1261521138]

[code]
if (command.equals(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

                castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
            }
        }
    }[/code]

[/quote]

That’s the same exact thing, it just checks to see if the players are unknown or null, and if they aren’t it will carry out the action.[/quote]
so it is, oops.

are you getting errors or isnt the command working at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleall command
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:4, topic:321269”][code]
if (command.equals(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

                castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
            }
        }
    }[/code][/quote]

That’s the same exact thing, it just checks to see if the players are unknown or null, and if they aren’t it will carry out the action.

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleall command
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Err, try this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("xteleall")) { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client player = (client) p; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; } }
